headline: DEWALT Awards Scholarships to Fund Trade Education; Cost of trade school is a key barrier for nearly half of pre-apprentices joining the trades, according to a recent DEWALT survey
summary: TOWSON, Md-- According to a recent survey from DEWALT, a Stanley Black & Decker brand and leader in total jobsite solutions, almost one-half of pre-apprentices are concerned with the cost of school....

headline: 3 Reasons to Sell SWK and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for Stanley Black & Decker. The stock has dropped 24.3% and now trades at $67.70, rattling many shareholders. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
